blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Phil: *going on waaay too long about communal showers and making it abundantly clear that they didnt actually use them in a...
body:
Phil: *going on waaay too long about communal showers and making it abundantly clear that they didnt actually use them in a communal way cuz he knows how we are omg*

Me: methinks the laddy doth protest too much 😏😏😏

title: rize livestream - 8/2/18
body:
• phil clarified they DIDN’T shower togehter
  • they’re discussing the specific part of the vagina that’s the fanny… we literally had to listen to dan and phil name different anatomical parts of the vagina.
  • phil’s official review of jumpsuit is “quite catchy” 
  • phil’s merch is coming out this month! the current issue is that some of the labels (not the actual merch) still have the fringe on it, so they’re trying to fix it. he’ll start a countdown on his twitter soon! 
  • they said that their day in los angeles would be “busy” 
  • possibly a new sims video soon!
  • giveaway winners WERE NOT ANNOUNCED; the giveaway goes on for the next two weeks.
  • the next livestream will NOT be next thursday, as they’ll be in los angeles that day. it’ll be either tuesday, wednesday, or friday; they’ll let us know!

reblog.comment:
• phil clarified they DIDN’T shower togehter
  • they’re discussing the specific part of the vagina that’s the fanny… we literally had to listen to dan and phil name different anatomical parts of the vagina.
  • phil’s official review of jumpsuit is “quite catchy” 
  • phil’s merch is coming out this month! the current issue is that some of the labels (not the actual merch) still have the fringe on it, so they’re trying to fix it. he’ll start a countdown on his twitter soon! 
  • they said that their day in los angeles would be “busy” 
  • possibly a new sims video soon!
  • giveaway winners WERE NOT ANNOUNCED; the giveaway goes on for the next two weeks.
  • the next livestream will NOT be next thursday, as they’ll be in los angeles that day. it’ll be either tuesday, wednesday, or friday; they’ll let us know!

trail.content_raw:
• phil clarified they DIDN’T shower togehter
  • they’re discussing the specific part of the vagina that’s the fanny… we literally had to listen to dan and phil name different anatomical parts of the vagina.
  • phil’s official review of jumpsuit is “quite catchy” 
  • phil’s merch is coming out this month! the current issue is that some of the labels (not the actual merch) still have the fringe on it, so they’re trying to fix it. he’ll start a countdown on his twitter soon! 
  • they said that their day in los angeles would be “busy” 
  • possibly a new sims video soon!
  • giveaway winners WERE NOT ANNOUNCED; the giveaway goes on for the next two weeks.
  • the next livestream will NOT be next thursday, as they’ll be in los angeles that day. it’ll be either tuesday, wednesday, or friday; they’ll let us know!
trail.content:
• phil clarified they DIDN’T shower togehter
  • they’re discussing the specific part of the vagina that’s the fanny… we literally had to listen to dan and phil name different anatomical parts of the vagina.
  • phil’s official review of jumpsuit is “quite catchy” 
  • phil’s merch is coming out this month! the current issue is that some of the labels (not the actual merch) still have the fringe on it, so they’re trying to fix it. he’ll start a countdown on his twitter soon! 
  • they said that their day in los angeles would be “busy” 
  • possibly a new sims video soon!
  • giveaway winners WERE NOT ANNOUNCED; the giveaway goes on for the next two weeks.
  • the next livestream will NOT be next thursday, as they’ll be in los angeles that day. it’ll be either tuesday, wednesday, or friday; they’ll let us know!

summary: rize show 2/8/18 i thought they went live but the app crashed THEY LIV ITTS 21:02 kfc land??? the internet is shit again m im...
body:
rize show 2/8/18

i thought they went live but the app crashed

THEY LIV ITTS 21:02

kfc land???

the internet is shit again m im sorry

phil said to fdan to no swear at us

talking abt the bfg???

showers????

phil has a new shower gel

dan was scared and doesnt like the woods when he got up

ordered lattes

smores frappe

explain the colon tweet

something in his head that was a draft

comunal showers

back to tweet and dan explains it

for fucks sake theyre back on the fanny subject

dan was like a fanny s a vulva im crying saogdovwygo

someone corrected them im screamig

phil doesnt want to get demonetised 

dan just went shove a tampon in that no thanks

phils scared of mosquitos

dans taco tweet

my internet is shit im sorry

tim hortons idk what that is

mmm capitalists phil is screaming

it fucking freezing agAIN

phils fucking fizzy milk tweet ew ew ew

dans laughin

talking about apple??

shaming phil

its fuckinh freezing whats new

dans singing

im restarting the app brb

spon

talking abt tickets available 

bus lag

iTS NOT FCKING WORKING

Sea lag???

phils grandad was in the navy

talking abt the crash it should have hit harder

everyone is okay

apart from the other car

dan thought they hit a curb

a coffee cup fell

police were there

talking abt top

philliked it v catchy doesnt know the lyrics

dans sappy ew

phils snaking i want coffee

dan said jalapeno wrong i hate them

signed photo SPON

phils arms aren long

august 25th runs out

they dont know geography and nor do it

it didnt show up insub boxes

iTS FREZZING FUCK

they talked abt ohio

phils merch this month i smell bs

HES TALKING TNH THE MERCH AND ITS FREEXING

some merch has the emo fringe in tag

its v soon

that week in march again wtf

next gaming video

its supposed to be busy in la

film gaming vid tomorrow

babuse

fUCKING KILL LADYDOOR

dan gave phil nightmares

i fuking hte them guess im notsleeping

phil had a dream with dan in the snow sounds familiar 

there was a child???

phil had his phone touch

phil haviing nightmares is me

its fcking freezing again

talking abt aus

talking abt the flight

phil wants to see a koala

imma resart the app brb

kangaroos 

slice u open

talking abt the drssing room

its freezing uhhhh

gaminG SIMS FUCKJ

roulette of the dressing room???

the next giveaway``

rize wwill contactfuck off

it ends in two weeks

I WANT A PAINTING UGHHHHH

shampoo exploaded

gave it good`“`ub 

phils looking at his book

watching movies

cAN THEY WATCH LOVE, SIMON PLEASE

im shaking my booty and thats the sound it makes-dan howell

theyre going finally

stay hydrated dans being soft fuCK OFF

and it ends at 21:31

summary: Phil Dan, and Julianne Moore were in the woods and it was snowing. Then Julianne fell in a hole that went to the center of the...
body: Phil Dan, and Julianne Moore were in the woods and it was snowing. Then Julianne fell in a hole that went to the center of the earth. Dan was holding Phil by the legs and let go so Phil fell to the center of the earth. Phil is on fire.

reblog.comment: Phil Dan, and Julianne Moore were in the woods and it was snowing. Then Julianne fell in a hole that went to the center of the earth. Dan was holding Phil by the legs and let go so Phil fell to the center of the earth. Phil is on fire.

trail.content_raw: Phil Dan, and Julianne Moore were in the woods and it was snowing. Then Julianne fell in a hole that went to the center of the earth. Dan was holding Phil by the legs and let go so Phil fell to the center of the earth. Phil is on fire.
trail.content: Phil Dan, and Julianne Moore were in the woods and it was snowing. Then Julianne fell in a hole that went to the center of the earth. Dan was holding Phil by the legs and let go so Phil fell to the center of the earth. Phil is on fire.
